content:
Hi!
I'm looking for a solution to display simple metrics on a FHIR server (e.g. ressource count depending on type or date), profile-agnostic, if possible. Something like "Tableau on FHIR" or "Superset on FHIR" I can't believe, I'm the first one to think of something like this, but googling it didn't really help.
Does anyone know of an existing solution for that?
Thanks in advance!
Sven

That's a start, thank you very much. I'll try that! Maybe I can find something similar for superset (being the open source alternative...) or build a workaround with fhirbase. Any more suggestions are welcome, of course ;)
Sven Helfer has marked this topic as resolved.
